timeline.author: pvary
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -35,6 +41,15 @@
    */
   long purge();
 
+  /**
+   * Returns a deserialized OrcTail instance associated with the ORC file on the given path.
+   *  Raw content is either obtained from cache, or from disk if there is a cache miss.
+   * @param path Orc file path
+   * @param conf jobConf

timeline.bodyText: What happens if the tail is evicted from the cache in the meantime (after the check, but before this line). Or it is locked during this code?
timeline.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: Oh, I see now... it is decRefBuffer...
replies.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: Yes, it won't be evicted as it is locked. The getFileMetadata invocation will incRef it (if it is found of course)
replies.author: szlta
